alert.note: Alert for Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 28 at 6:11AM EST until December 28 at 10:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast New Jersey, including the following county, Bergen. * WHEN...Until 915 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Several river and stream gauges across the area are either elevated or above the minor flood benchmark. Locations that have yet to crest should do so in the next hour or two, otherwise water levels will recede through the morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 604 AM EST, This will cause river and small stream flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
